channel.title: Movellus Circuits
channel.description: Movellus provides analog solutions with the flexibility of digital designs. Seamless integration, reduced power consumption, small silicon area and silicon verified IP and more.

item.title: Ann Arbor’s Movellus Circuits named best emerging company in GLEQ contest
item.description:
Ann Arbor-based Movellus Circuits won the grand prize of $25,000 Tuesday as the best emerging company at the 14th annual Great Lakes Entrepreneurs Quest business plan competition at the Marriott Eagle Crest resort in Ypsilanti…

+ READ MORE
